text: Leptolejeunea is a genus of liverwort in family Lejeuneaceae. It contains the following species (but this list may be incomplete): * Leptolejeunea tridentata, Bischl. * Leptolejeunea elliptica, (Lehm. & Lindenb.) Schiffn. == References == Category:Porellales genera Category:Lejeuneaceae Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Leptolejeunea
